name: ACCT_COLL_AGENCY_HX
description: This table contains historical collection agency information associated with the guarantor account.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AGENCY_ID
columns.description: The collection agency that this account was assigned to.

columns.name: AGENCY_ID_COLL_AGENCY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the collection agency.

columns.name: SUBMIT_DATE
columns.description: The date the account was assigned to the collection agency.

columns.name: RESOLVED_DATE
columns.description: The date the account was resolved by the collection agency.

columns.name: RESOLUTION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of resolution that occurred for this history line.
